pre_caption: This is a static, unmoving shot of a residential scene. The camera is focused on a two-story house with a traditional Japanese blue-tiled roof. In front of the house is a meticulously maintained garden with a variety of green and red-leafed trees and shrubs, enclosed by a brown fence. The weather is sunny, with a bright blue sky and a few white clouds overhead.
